html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-09812020-12-04,  ,  ,  HC,  , 
ActPest Control Products Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Pest Control Products Regulations (Sodium Bromide and Potassium Monopersulfate)
PrecisRegulations amending the PEST CONTROL PRODUCTS REGULATIONS (SODIUM BROMIDE AND POTASSIUM MONOPERSULFATE) in order to remove sodium bromide at a 35% concentration and potassium monopersulfate at a 32% concentration from the list of spa products in Schedule 2 of the Regulations that are exempted from registration, subject to certain conditions, clarifying that these products are not authorized.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0263 Publication Date: 2020-12-23
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Pest Control Products Regulations (Sodium Bromide and Potassium Monopersulfate)
precis: Regulations amending the PEST CONTROL PRODUCTS REGULATIONS (SODIUM BROMIDE AND POTASSIUM MONOPERSULFATE) in order to remove sodium bromide at a 35% concentration and potassium monopersulfate at a 32% concentration from the list of spa products in Schedule 2 of the Regulations that are exempted from registration, subject to certain conditions, clarifying that these products are not authorized.
